title: The Against Taffy Sinclair Club
description: It was bad enough when snobby Taffy Sinclair was just a pretty face. But now, she's gone and developed you-know-whats. This calls for drastic measures from the Against Taffy Sinclair Club made up of Jana Morgan and her four fifth-grade friends. What Jana and her friends don't know is that even the best-laid plans can backfire suddenly.
author: Betsy Haynes
